channel.title: How do i get rid of lag on my server
channel.description: every1 on my server is complaing of lag and my computer lags badly it has been fine the past 2 weeks just recently it has lagged badly what can i do ?

item.title: How do i get rid of lag on my server
item.dc:creator: @The_Wise_Guy .Kaboom
item.description:
@The_Wise_Guy wrote:

[quote=“X Teh Nick X, post:3, topic:84680”][quote author=.Kaboom (The Wise Guy) link=topic=124279.msg1214987#msg1214987 date=1177517220]
Go to your shopping centre and swipe that credit card
[/quote]
No need for that spamm Kaboom.
Eeither you are in need of upgrading you computer, your internet is slow, or you have too many global objects / npc’s in your server.[/quote]

How was that spam. Explain please.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i get rid of lag on my server

item.title: How do i get rid of lag on my server
item.dc:creator: @hi123 hi123
item.description:
@hi123 wrote:

Dont Add Alot of stuff in Boolean process…

Try diffent cases. to put stuff in. like NewObjects(); Some Put in Boolean Put in Case 121: Well Bottom Of Case 121:
